attributes.name: Country Reference
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Country Reference card for standardized international country information in the Boxel framework. This card should provide ISO-compliant country data with currency, language, timezone, and geographical information for use in addresses, user profiles, regional settings, and international business operations.

## Core Fields

### ISO Standard Identifiers
- **isoAlpha2Code**: StringField - 2-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (e.g., "US", "CA")
- **isoAlpha3Code**: StringField - 3-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (e.g., "USA", "CAN")
- **numericCode**: StringField - 3-digit ISO 3166-1 numeric country code (e.g., "840")
- **countryName**: StringField - Official or common name of the country
- **shortName**: StringField - Commonly used short name
- **alternateNames**: containsMany(StringField) - Historical or alternative country names
- **demonym**: StringField - Name for citizens (e.g., "American", "Canadian")

### Geographic Information
- **continent**: StringField - Continental classification
- **region**: StringField - Geographic region (e.g., "Northern America", "Western Europe")
- **subregion**: StringField - More specific regional classification
- **landlocked**: BooleanField - Whether country has no coastline
- **area**: NumberField - Total area in square kilometers
- **coordinates**: contains(GeoLocation) - Geographic center coordinates
- **borders**: containsMany(CountryBorder) - Neighboring countries
- **timezones**: containsMany(TimezoneInfo) - All timezones in the country

### Political & Administrative
- **sovereignty**: StringField - Political status (sovereign, dependency, territory)
- **governmentType**: StringField - Form of government
- **headOfState**: StringField - Current head of state title
- **headOfGovernment**: StringField - Current head of government title
- **capital**: StringField - Capital city name
- **majorCities**: containsMany(CityInfo) - Important urban centers
- **independence**: contains(IndependenceInfo) - Independence date and details
- **nationalHolidays**: containsMany(NationalHoliday) - Official holidays

### Economic Information
- **defaultCurrencyCode**: StringField - Primary currency ISO code
- **currencies**: containsMany(CurrencyInfo) - All currencies used
- **economicClassification**: StringField - Development level classification
- **gdpPerCapita**: NumberField - Gross domestic product per capita
- **economicBlocs**: containsMany(StringField) - Trade agreements and unions
- **tradingPartners**: containsMany(TradingPartner) - Major economic partners

### Communication & Localization
- **phoneCountryCode**: StringField - International dialing code
- **internetTLD**: StringField - Top-level domain (e.g., ".us", ".ca")
- **primaryLanguageCode**: StringField - Most common language ISO code
- **officialLanguages**: containsMany(LanguageInfo) - Government-recognized languages
- **spokenLanguages**: containsMany(LanguageUsage) - Languages with speaker percentages
- **drivingSide**: StringField - Left or right side driving
- **measurementSystem**: StringField - Metric, imperial, or mixed

### Visual & Cultural Elements
- **flagEmoji**: StringField - Unicode flag emoji representation
- **flagImageUrl**: contains(ImageField) - Official flag image
- **coatOfArmsUrl**: contains(ImageField) - National coat of arms
- **nationalAnthem**: StringField - Name of national anthem
- **culturalSymbols**: containsMany(CulturalSymbol) - Important national symbols
- **worldHeritageSites**: NumberField - UNESCO World Heritage Site count

### Address Format
- **postalCodeFormat**: StringField - Postal code format pattern
- **postalCodeExample**: StringField - Example postal code
- **addressFormat**: MarkdownField - Standard address formatting rules
- **addressComponents**: containsMany(AddressComponent) - Required address fields
- **stateProvinceName**: StringField - Term used for subdivisions

### International Relations
- **unMembershipDate**: DateField - UN membership date
- **diplomaticRelations**: containsMany(DiplomaticRelation) - Embassy locations
- **internationalOrganizations**: containsMany(StringField) - Membership in organizations
- **treatyObligations**: containsMany(Treaty) - International agreements
- **sanctions**: containsMany(Sanction) - Current international sanctions

### Travel & Immigration
- **passportRequired**: BooleanField - Passport requirement for entry
- **visaPolicy**: contains(VisaPolicy) - Visa requirements by country
- **travelAdvisories**: containsMany(TravelAdvisory) - Current safety warnings
- **vaccinationRequirements**: containsMany(VaccinationReq) - Health requirements
- **customsRegulations**: MarkdownField - Import/export restrictions

### Data Quality & Management
- **isActive**: BooleanField - Available for selection in applications
- **isRecognized**: BooleanField - Internationally recognized sovereignty
- **lastVerified**: DateField - When information was last validated
- **dataSource**: StringField - Primary source of information
- **confidence**: NumberField - Data accuracy confidence level
- **notes**: MarkdownField - Additional contextual information

## Required Component Cards

### StateProvince Card
Create a separate StateProvince card with:
- **stateProvinceCode**: StringField - Official subdivision code
- **stateProvinceName**: StringField - Official subdivision name
- **subdivisionType**: StringField - State, province, territory, region
- **capital**: StringField - Administrative center
- **population**: NumberField - Current population estimate
- **area**: NumberField - Area in square kilometers
- **timeZone**: StringField - Primary timezone
- **economicContribution**: NumberField - GDP contribution percentage

### CurrencyInfo Card
- **currencyCode**: StringField - ISO 4217 currency code
- **currencyName**: StringField - Full currency name
- **symbol**: StringField - Currency symbol
- **isOfficial**: BooleanField - Official currency status
- **adoptionDate**: DateField - When currency was adopted
- **exchangeRate**: NumberField - Current rate to USD
- **inflationRate**: NumberField - Annual inflation rate

### LanguageInfo Card
- **languageCode**: StringField - ISO 639 language code
- **languageName**: StringField - Language name
- **isOfficial**: BooleanField - Official language status
- **speakerPercentage**: NumberField - Percentage of population
- **speakerCount**: NumberField - Estimated number of speakers
- **writingSystem**: StringField - Script used for writing
- **dialects**: containsMany(StringField) - Regional variations

## Computed Fields Logic

### Regional Classification
Automatic classification based on UN geoscheme and continental assignments.

### Economic Indicators
Calculated rankings and classifications based on World Bank data.

### Diplomatic Status
Current recognition status and diplomatic relationship summaries.

### Travel Risk Assessment
Aggregated travel safety score based on multiple advisory sources.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a comprehensive country information interface:

**Header Section**
- Country name and flag prominently displayed
- ISO codes and basic classification
- Quick facts summary (capital, currency, language)
- Regional and continental context
- Sovereignty and recognition status

**Geographic Information Panel**
- **Location Details**:
  - Continental and regional placement
  - Neighboring countries map
  - Geographic coordinates
  - Area and population density
  - Climate and topography overview
  
- **Administrative Structure**:
  - Government type and structure
  - Capital and major cities
  - Administrative subdivisions
  - Time zones coverage

**Economic & Social Data**
- Currency information and exchange rates
- Economic classification and indicators
- Language distribution and literacy
- Cultural and religious composition
- International trade relationships

**Practical Information**
- Address formatting guidelines
- Postal code system
- Phone number formatting
- Business culture notes
- Legal and regulatory environment

**International Relations**
- UN and international organization membership
- Diplomatic missions and embassies
- Trade agreements and partnerships
- Travel and visa requirements
- Current advisories and restrictions

### Reference Data View
- ISO standard code reference
- Currency and exchange rate data
- Language and cultural information
- Geographic and demographic statistics
- Political and economic indicators

### Integration Helper View
- API endpoint information
- Data synchronization status
- Validation rules and constraints
- Usage analytics and access patterns
- Update history and change tracking

## Interactive Features

### Geographic Visualization
- Interactive country maps
- Neighboring country navigation
- Regional comparison tools
- Statistical visualization
- Historical timeline displays

### Data Management
- Bulk data import and validation
- Change tracking and approval workflows
- Data quality monitoring
- Source attribution and verification
- Update notification systems

### Integration Tools
- API access and documentation
- Data export in multiple formats
- Real-time synchronization
- Webhook notifications
- Custom field extensions

## Styling Requirements
- International and culturally neutral design
- Flag and symbol display optimization
- Multi-language text support
- High contrast for accessibility
- Print-friendly reference layouts
- Mobile-responsive design
- RTL language support
- Cultural color sensitivity

## Validation Rules
- ISO code format compliance
- Unique identifier constraints
- Geographic coordinate validation
- Currency code verification
- Language code standardization
- Date format consistency
- Flag emoji validity
- Phone code format verification

## Integration Points
- **Geographic APIs**: OpenStreetMap, Google Maps, MapBox
- **Currency Services**: OpenExchangeRates, Fixer.io, ECB
- **Government Data**: Official statistical offices
- **International Organizations**: UN, World Bank, IMF
- **Travel Services**: State Department, foreign ministries
- **Cultural Data**: Wikipedia, CIA World Factbook
- **Language Services**: ISO 639 registries
- **Economic Data**: OECD, regional development banks
- **Postal Services**: Universal Postal Union
- **Time Zone Data**: IANA Time Zone Database

## Business Logic Requirements
- Automatic ISO standard compliance checking
- Real-time currency and economic data updates
- Geographic relationship validation
- Political status change monitoring
- Travel advisory integration and alerts
- Cultural sensitivity and accuracy verification
- Multi-source data reconciliation and conflict resolution
- Historical data preservation and versioning
- Regulatory compliance for international business
- Accessibility and localization support
- Integration with address validation services
- Support for disputed territories and special cases
- Performance optimization for high-volume lookups
- Caching and distribution for global applications
